entry.def: You use whose at the beginning of a relative clause where you mention something that belongs to or is associated with the person or thing mentioned in the previous clause.
entry.tran: (用于关系从句的句首，表示与前句所提到的人或事物有所属关系或相关联）

example.ex: I saw a man shouting at a driver whose car was blocking the street.
example.tran: 我看见一个男人正朝一个司机叫嚷，他的车把街道堵塞了。

example.ex: ...a speedboat, whose fifteen-strong crew claimed to belong to the Italian navy.
example.tran: 一艘快艇，其上船员15人，声称自己属于意大利海军

entry.def: You use whose in questions to ask about the person or thing that something belongs to or is associated with.
entry.tran: (用于疑问句中，询问某物所属或其与何人何事有关)谁的

entry.def: You use whose after certain words, especially verbs and adjectives, to introduce a clause where you talk about the person or thing that something belongs to or is associated with.
entry.tran: (尤用在动词或形容词等后面，引导谈论某物所属或与何人何事相关的从句)谁的

example.ex: I'm wondering whose mother she is then...
example.tran: 我很纳闷，那么她是谁的母亲呢？

example.ex: I can't remember whose idea it was for us to meet again.
example.tran: 我记不清我们再次会面是谁的主意了。

sentences.cn: 工业革命曾遭到勒德分子的反对，因为他们的工作被机械化织布机所取代，但总的来说，工业革命提高了生活水平，且与曾经被毁掉的工作相比，它创造了更多新的就业机会。
sentences.en: The Industrial Revolution didn't go so well for Luddites whose jobs were displaced by mechanized looms, but it eventually raised living standards and created jobs than it destroyed.

sentences.cn: 最成功的分享者——也就是那些数据最常被下载引用的人们——会引起关注，他们的工作成果也会被使用。
sentences.en: The most successful sharers— those whose data are downloaded and cited the most often— get noticed, and their work gets used.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 消费者所带来的消费对于一个健康的经济来说是必须的, 而他们被认为会勒紧他们的裤带子.
sentences.en: Consumers, whose spending is indispensable to a healthy economy, are expected to have tightened their belts.

sentences.cn: 公交快速车道激怒了汽车司机, 他们的抱怨广受新德里大型英文报纸的用户.
sentences.en: The BRT has infuriated car drivers, whose complaints championed by Delhi's big English newspapers.

sentences.cn: 没有人是完美的, 尤其是运动员, 他们的跟腱、肌腱、腿筋并不是每时每刻都能正常运转的.
sentences.en: Everybody is flawed, particularly athletes, whose Achilles " tendons or hamstrings can go at any time. "

sentences.cn: 10他们的手中有奸恶, 右手满有贿赂.
sentences.en: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.

sentences.cn: 有四十七位浪人最为著名,近松门左卫门在《忠臣藏》剧目中颂扬了他们的行为.
sentences.en: The most famous ronin were the 47 whose actions were celebrated in the kabuki play Chushingura.

sentences.cn: 8他们的口说虚谎的话, 他们的右手是起假誓的右手.
sentences.en: Whose mouth speaks deceit, And whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood.

sentences.cn: 基督徒是被称为荣誉的人,他们的话是可以信任的.
sentences.en: The Christian is called to be a person of honor whose word can be trusted.

sentences.cn: 那些承受着似乎不可承受的痛苦的人们,上帝听到了他们的祈祷.
sentences.en: He hears the prayers of those whose suffering seems unbearable.

sentences.cn: 那些悲观的预言者必定感到彻底失望,因为他们的预言全被粉碎.
sentences.en: It has been a total disappointment to the doomsayers whose predictions have been shattered to pieces.

sentences.cn: 春天的洪水对农人来说是一大灾难,他们的农作物和房子都被破坏了.
sentences.en: The spring floods were great calamity to the farmers whose crops and houses were ruined.

sentences.cn: 各个德莫同样也有自己的神庙及守护神或英雄, 并选出侍奉他们的神职人员.
sentences.en: They were also given their own temple and patron divinity or hero, whose priests they elected.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 家庭、私有制和国家的起源

sentences.cn: 否则他们的妈妈可能永远不会两次吓尿裤子.
sentences.en: Whose moms probably woulda never gave two squirts of piss.

sentences.cn: 律师们一旦违法,仍必要从他们当中选出法官.这是他们的与众不同之处.
sentences.en: Lawyers are the only civil delinquents whose judge must of necessity be chosen from themselves.

sentences.cn: 那些还逍遥法外的犯罪者,没有对他们的罪行作出道歉.
sentences.en: There are no apologies for crimes whose perpetrators are still at large.

sentences.cn: 威胁借款人的最大困难是,他们的房子已经比他们的贷款更不值钱了.
sentences.en: The greatest difficulties threaten borrowers whose house is worth less than their mortgage.

sentences.cn: 我们这个社会有些可怜的、处在社会边缘的人们,他们的言论总被封锁、遏制.
sentences.en: We have poor people and marginalized people in society whose voices are being muzzled.

sentences.cn: 看到他手里拿满了糖果,孩子们冲下去扑向他们的祖父.
sentences.en: Kids charged down to their grandfather, whose hands were full of candies.

sentences.cn: 那末,来吧, 这里有两千个显要人物, 他们的财产可以弥补财政赤字.
sentences.en: Come , then! Here are two thousand notables, whose property will supply the deficit.

sentences.cn: 所有这些对经营者来说丝毫没有乐趣可言, 他们的利润被无限压榨.
sentences.en: All this is no fun for contractors, whose margins are being squeezed.

sentences.cn: 最近镇上出现几个陌生人,他们的来历鲜有人知.
sentences.en: Some strangers came to our town recently whose background nobody knows.

sentences.cn: 波士顿环球报的读者,他们的父母过去是操纵国家的人.
sentences.en: The Boston Globe is read by people whose parents used to run the country.

sentences.cn: 8他们的口说谎话.他们的右手起假誓.

sentences.cn: 春天的洪水对于农民而言是一场大灾难,他们的庄稼和房屋都被摧毁了.
sentences.en: The spring floods were a great calamity to the farmers whose crops and houses were ruined.

sentences.cn: 清除繁体字对番邦人照理应该如此无差,至少又实在不是他们的文化!
sentences.en: Abolishment of Traditional Chinese makes no difference to the people whose native language is not Chinese.

sentences.cn: 七贤有时是一些姐妹, 有时又是一些兄弟, 他们的名字在故事间变来变去.
sentences.en: The Seven are sisters, or sometimes brothers, whose names vary from tale to tale.

sentences.cn: 你可以介绍我们给他们的父母﹝当地支援团体﹞ 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can you refer us to their parents whose children isolatedform our local support group?

sentences.cn: 38亚悉有六个儿子, 他们的名字是亚斯利干 、 波基路、以实玛利、示亚利雅、俄巴底雅、哈难.
sentences.en: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam and Ishmael andand Obadiah and Hanan.
